titleInfo.title: Gus Cohen Standing in Front of Guffey's First Post Office

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#464 Gus Cohen family of Guffey.'' On back of photograph: ''This is Guffey's first post office - about 1894. The Post Master standing in front is Gus Cohen. The man in the wagon - last row front is Wolf Poznansky.''

mods.abstract: Guffey, Colorado's first Post Office. Standing in front of the entrance is Gus Cohen, Post Master. Wolf Poznansky is seated in the wagon in the last row, front.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
